original_text: And the king of Egypt spake to the Hebrew midwives, of which the name of the one was Shiphrah, and the name of the other Puah:
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 히브리 산파 십브라라 하는 사람과 부아라 하는 사람에게 말하여

sentences.original_text: And the king of Egypt spake
of which the name of the one was Shiphrah
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 한 사람의 이름은 십브라였고

sentences.original_text: and the name of the other Puah:
